description: An evocative, sometimes painful tale. A story where past and present become blurred under young Etienneâ€™s eyes. Who was his father? Why did his name become legendary? A tragic fate that seems to go on, one generation after the other: a destiny made of violence and loneliness, that no "Chevalier" can escape. Not even Demian...
name: Uomini d'oro

description: Memories, emotions, regrets. Beautiful Marie often thinks about Demian. She hopes to see him again, one day, but she has no idea that, from the dusty roads of Equatorial Africa to the warm Marseille promenade, a diabolical plot is about to begin. The beautiful and ruthless Dalila wants to revive Trait Dâ€™Union, Jean-Luc Corsariâ€™s criminal organization, and she just wonâ€™t stop. Sheâ€™s even ready to play with the life of young Etienne, Demianâ€™s son!
name: Ritorno a Marsiglia

description: After the dire days when his son Etienne was kidnapped by the men of the new Trait Dâ€™Union, for Demian seems to be the time to finally be with his family. The beautiful Marie, Gaston, Edmond and Viviane are waiting for him, ready to happily embrace him. But his future appears on the verge of becoming cloudy again... Dalila, the charming adventurer whose life the Chevalier decided to spare, is determined to become the boss of Marseilleâ€™s underworld. And thereâ€™s only one way to do that... join forces with a ruthless and mysterious man whoâ€™s been harbouring an obsession for many years: to kill Demian Du Lac!
name: Senza tregua

description: The Hulks go to war! Everything Bruce Banner knows has been turned upside-down - and everything he's ever desired may be just a heartbeat away. Don't miss the insane action as Skaar faces his most brutal battle, and Bruce his greatest temptation - and the identity of a certain scarlet smasher is finally revealed! Plus: Brace yourself for the coming of Hulkpool! And see what the other hulked-out heroes are up to as the gamma-god of thunder and a not-so-friendly neighborhood Spider-Man tear up Washington, D.C., and Wolverine and Bucky Barnes square off! And what path has led the Savage She-Hulk called Lyra the Wizard's Frightful Four? Collecting WORLD WAR HULKS #1, FALL OF THE HULKS: SAVAGE SHE-HULKS #1-3, HULKED-OUT HEROES #1-2, WORLD WAR HULKS: SPIDER-MAN VS. THOR #1-2, WORLD WAR HULKS: CAPTAIN AMERICA VS. WOLVERINE #1-2, and INCREDIBLE HULK (1968) #312 and #609-611.
name: Incredible Hulks: World War Hulks

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

person_credits.name: Jack T. Chick
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: The biggest mutant cover-up has gone public as the true history of the X-Gene is revealed. The U.S. government has been outed as the X-Gene's creator, and mutants have been branded terrorists. As an identity crisis rocks the mutant world, the mistrust between man and x-man gets deeper - and it is during this insanity that the X-Men emerge. Who are the X-Men? And how will they fare in a world in which they're criminals? Will these outlaw mutants be willing to defend mankind when all humanity cries out for their imprisonment? Collecting ULTIMATE COMICS X-MEN #1-6.
name: Volume One

volume.name: Ultimate Comics X-Men by Nick Spencer

description: Wolverine and Nick Fury - as both allies and adversaries! When they embark on a mission to stop the criminal mastermind Scorpio, Ma Fury's favorite son has very personal reasons for wanting to bring in the villain alive. But what happens when Logan wants him dead? You just know sparks are gonna fly! Plus: Wolverine again clashes with Fury when he tracks down a child-abusing drug peddler - but finds Fury protecting him?! Thrill to the exploits of Marvel's two long-lived espionage experts in these extra-sized tales of intrigue guaranteed to deliver! Collecting WOLVERINE/NICK FURY: THE SCORPIO CONNECTION, WOLVERINE: BLOODY CHOICES and WOLVERINE & NICK FURY: SCORPIO RISING.
name: Wolverine and Nick Fury: Scorpio

description: Spinning out of the landmark events of X-MEN SCHISM! It's a new day for Wolverine, but first he has one last bit of old business to deal with in Chinatown. Journey to the stronghold of the world's newest, most powerful drug dealer - at the center of the earth. There, Logan finds two fierce and unlikely new allies: the Agents of Atlas' Gorilla Man and the Immortal Weapon Fat Cobra! Then, it's a prelude to the biggest Wolverine arc in years. War is brewing between Hand ninjas and Yakuza gangsters, and it brings Wolverine face-to-face with Wilson Fisk, the Kingpin of Crime. What mysterious former love interests have come along for the ride? And who's behind this war, anyway? Do you like surprises? If so, then don't miss this story - it offers up a doozy. Collecting WOLVERINE (2010) #17-20.
name: HC/TPB

volume.name: Richie Rich & New Kids on the Block
Richie Rich & New Kids on the Block
Richie Rich & New Kids on the Block

description: Alternate World War II history as youâ€™ve never seen it before! A battle-hardened veteran, Sgt. Bryce, is given a cushy mission to scout a mountain valley. Only problem is, heâ€™s given a squad of useless recruits for the job. After finding a treasure map on a dead SS deserter, Bryce leads his squad to a hidden German facility, full of incredible machines and advanced technology. It appears completely deserted, but when one of his squad vanishes, ripped apart by â€˜somethingâ€™ lurking in the shadows, Bryce realizes too lateâ€¦theyâ€™re not alone.
name: Issue 1

volume.name: Dark Axis: Rise of the Overmen

description: Realizing something else is lurking in the shadows of the nazi facility, Bryce and his men are attacked by terrifying, mutated creatures! Sgt. Bryce is K.I.A. and the men scatter, only to find themselves cornered with more and more of the hideous horde of twisted creatures surging towards their location. The desperate men prepare for the fight of their lives, that is, until the door behind opens, revealing something even more terrifying than a deformed nazi horde!

volume.name: Dark Axis: Rise of the Overmen

description: Sergeant Bryce is back! After rescuing the squad from the crazed Nazi inhabitants he, Hillview and Smith decide thereâ€™s only one thing for it â€“ they must split up. Hillview is commanded to lead the surviving men to safety while Bryce and Smith head back down to find a radio and call in an air-strike. With any luck theyâ€™ll wipe the facility with all its monstrous technology from the face of the earth. Things get more complicated as they discover a young female prisoner who must join Hillviewâ€™s party in their escape. Meanwhile, Dr. Eisler undergoes a radical transformation, intent on making sure none of them leaveâ€¦alive.

volume.name: Dark Axis: Rise of the Overmen

description: When Mara Shin's dog Toto gets lost one fateful day, she goes in search for him along a yellow brick road and ends up in the wonderful land of Oz! Everyone starts calling her Dorothy, but these aren't the cowardly lion, scarecrow and tin man adventures you remember! This fantastic fairy tale features familiar charactersâ€¦but with a definite Asian twist!

Pureheart the Powerful in 'Mite and Maim.' When bright-eyed reporters Betty and Veronica capture evil-doer The Octopus assaulting the mayor on camera, they're guaranteed a front page scoop! Not about to let the story see the light of day, The Octopus apprehends the girls. Who should stand in the way but Pureheart the Powerful! Will Pureheart's strength be able to withstand Veronica's kiss in order to save the day or will The Octopus manage to stop the presses?
name: Mite and Maim

description: In Jughead's seemingly never-ending quest to find a place to call home, the teen and his canine companion Hotdog shack up in the unlikeliest of places: Lodge Estates. Not accustomed to a life of luxury, will Jughead conform to high society or will his slovenly ways put him back on the street? Plus, how does Mr. Lodge plan to use his new houseguest to his advantage?
name: A Jughead in the Family, Part Six: The Pleasure of His Company

description: Jughead in 'Picture Perfect.' Lights! Camera! Burger! Pop hires an agency to take pictures for a Chok'lit Shoppe ad but first they must piece together the perfect burger. As Jughead learns, creating photogenic food is a work of art - but will Pop be smiling at the results?

Eastbury, Massachusetts. Quiet, peaceful, prosperous. Surely the ideal place to raise a family? For the Montgomery family, the death of their baby daughter is a mystery that medicine should be able to answer, but can't. For the Corliss family, the disappearance of their teenage son will bring many eyes to Eastbury, and spark a quite different type of mystery. What has happened to these children? Eastbury happened.

Raizo and his kunoichi are on a mission to confront Kabuki Seigan and rescue Kagari. The odds are against them as Seigan commands the deadly Army of 100 Flowers. However, there is hope in the special power behind Raizo's sword... But will it be enough to overcome an entire army? It all comes to a head in this exciting final volume of Ninja Girls!

Final Volume!

Includes special extras after the story!
name: Walk Softly and Carry A Magic Sword

description:
Over the last ten years, Daikichi has put his adopted daughter Rin before himself and found happiness in her happiness. But having given what some would call the best years of his life to raising his grandfather's illegitimate child, the now-forty-something Daikichi has all but given up on finding the woman of his dreams. Though this situation has yet to strain the relationship between Daikichi and Rin, will the ups-and-downs of adolescence leave Rin, now a thoughtful young woman, wanting for a motherly influence in her life? And as Rin becomes embroiled in the whirlwind of exams, dating, and the like, can Daikichi only sit back and watch?

Episode 25 - 30.
name: Vol. 5

description: It's another new year, and we all know what that means - time for Kyon's first dream of the year! Once again, lucky(?) omens hawk, eggplant, and Mount Fuji (played respectively by Tsuruya, Nagato, and Koizumi) make an appearance, but their promise of fortune never seems to play out for Kyon. All he ever gets is fresh year of Haruhi-chan's antics! The SOS Brigade goes miniature, Koizumi's trying out a new look, and everyone seems intent on getting Kyon into a dress!
name: Vol. 5

description: As Lawrence and Holo put the final phase of their plan to extricate themselves from the jaws of financial ruin into motion, they are confronted by an unforeseen obstacle. With the wolves at the door - both figuratively and literally - can the travelers keep their wits about them and come out ahead of the pack?
name: Vol. 6

description: As we rush toward the end of Peanuts' second full decade, Snoopy finds himself almost completely engrossed in his persona as the 'World War I Flying Ace' - to the point where he goes to camp with Charlie Brown and maintains his persona throughout the entire two-week period (much to Peppermint Patty's bafflement). Snoopy dominates this volume with his various adventures and his dealing with the return of his original owner, Lila. If you're surprised by that last one, imagine how Charlie Brown feels! Lila makes only a brief appearance, but this volume sees the appearance of what would be Schulz's most controversial major character: Franklin. (Yes, in 1968 the introduction of a black character caused a stir.) Peppermint Patty, working toward her ascendancy as one of the major Peanuts players in the 1970s and 1980s, also has several major turns, including a storyline in which she's the tent monitor for three little girls - who call her 'Sir.' Another storyline has her and JosÃ© Peterson temporarily join Charlie Brown's baseball team. Introduction by John Waters.
Fighting for truth, justice, and early parole, four super-powered convicts are given the chance to redeem themselves by working as government-sponsored super-heroes.
name: TPB

description:
1) The Pink Panther - Pink Pilot - 8 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #5)

2) The Pink Panther - Rock-A-Bye Pink - 5 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #5)

3) The Inspector - Le Quiet Squad - 6 pages (adaptation of the 14th Inspector cartoon of the same name) feat. Commissioner, Sergeant Deux Deux (not in cartoon) (reprint from The Pink Panther #5)

4) The Pink Panther - Pink Blue-Print - 6 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #5)

Copyright 1972, by UAC-Geoffrey

NOTE: Reprint of The Pink Panther #5 - Pink Pilot
name: Pink Pilot
Alles Dreht Sich um Baby Blues

name: Mickey Mouse: Secret of the Ming Vase
